com.diffplug.gradle.oomph.thirdparty

Class ConventionThirdParty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.gradle.oomph.OomphConvention
      • com.diffplug.gradle.oomph.thirdparty.ConventionThirdParty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class ConventionThirdParty
extends OomphConvention

    This is a place for third-party modules to add their own configuration logic. It’s a bit wild-west.
